title: Game-Based Learning Design and Application: Competency Development for Social Sector Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sociological theories and comprehension of game mechanics
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented design considering workplace application for employed learners

learning_goals: Learners can develop educational game prototypes for social studies by applying basic game design principles.
Learners can design in-organization collaboration simulations and establish execution plans using game-based learning models.
Learners can propose three or more learning motivation strategies utilizing game elements (leaderboards, quests, etc.).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
